_comment2: Copy this to .vscode-node-red-tools.json and customize as needed
_comment3: Remove all _comment fields from your actual config
_flows_help: Path to flows file (relative to repo root)

plugins._enabled_help: List of plugin names to enable (empty = all enabled)
plugins._order_help: Custom plugin execution order (empty = use priority/filename)

watch._pollInterval_help: How often to check server for changes (seconds)
watch._debounce_help: Wait time after file change before uploading (seconds)
watch._convergenceLimit_help: Max upload/download cycles before oscillation warning
watch._convergenceWindow_help: Time window in seconds for counting convergence cycles
